typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

baseURI().details: Returns the base URI set via {_setBaseURI}. This will be automatically added as a prefix in {tokenURI} to each token's URI, or to the token ID if no specific URI is set for that token ID.

burn(uint256).details: Burns `tokenId`. See {ERC721-_burn}.     * Requirements:     * - The caller must own `tokenId` or be an approved operator.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.
